attributes.action: To become an mp,you must serve in the military,police,coastguard,prison service for 5 years minimum
attributes.additional_details:
I would like all future mp,s to serve a minimum of 5 years in either,the military,police,coastguard,or prison service.many mp,s have never done a proper job in all their life.
Ie,Borden brown,ed milliband ect,why can,t future mp,s serve the country first.
